q: What can you do for me?

alt.markdown:
# **Recommended Occupations**

**link:** Students often aren't aware of all the career options they have upon graduation, especially occupations that are not directly related to their major.

**Feature:**  These carrousels recommend occupations that fit the student's profile. Each card contains:
- Occupation name
- Skill match

Clicking on a card opens the _Occupation Modal_.

The criteria for recommendations are the following:
- "Recommended Occupations based on your skills"
   - Occupations the student has the highest skill match with
- "Recommended Occupations based on your major"
   - Among the occupations linked to the student's major, the occupations with the highest skill match

If a student has more than one major, an additional carousel will appear.

**Benefit:** Students can see alternative careers to explore and get a better idea of what occupations they can pursue.

# **Learn A Skill**

**link:** Students often need help finding courses to begin learning their upskilling objectives.

**Feature:** This tile shows them the top course recommendation (the course that appears first on the Course Recommendations list) for each of the skills the user has listed in the "To Learn" column of their kanban board. These recommendations are shown in the form of a carousel of course cards. When clicked, those cards link the user to the corresponding course. If a course is not available for a skill on the kanban, it is not represented on this tile. Additionally, there is a link to the kanban board so they can view and edit their upskilling objectives.

**Benefits:** Students can see course recommendations on their home dashboard and make faster upskilling decisions by starting to learn one of their objectives.

q: Display the Learn a Skill example

q: How to check the Dashboard of 1Mentor
How to interact with the 1Mentor Platform

alt.markdown:
# **TOP INSIGHTS**

**link:** Industry is evolving faster than ever before and keeping track of the latest trends isn’t easy when dealing with a diverse set of careers.

**feature:** This card showcases key insights gathered from the data we have available, and information inputted by students in their profiles. This information is related to the user's interests, major, or recommendations.

**benefits:** Through these insights, users can stay updated on the most important labor market developments in a matter of seconds.

# **Recommended Skills**

**link:** It is challenging for students to identify and prioritize which skills to learn in preparation for their future career, or in accordance to their goals. 

**Feature:**  These cards show the 4 skills that our system recommends the user. Each card contains the following information:
- Skill type
- Skill name
Clicking the card opens the corresponding skills modal.

**Benefit:** Students can see the skills that will best help them achieve their career objectives.

qna.a: 1Mentor's technology uses AI to understand industry’s ever-changing demands and empower students to outpace future disruptions. We equip institutions with data-driven recommendations on skills, tools and knowledge required by industry to enhance programs and student career guidance. Also, 1Mentor equips key decision-makers  with industry information to better prepare students. 1Mentor empowers students with information helping them take an active role in pursuing their career path.We guide students with data-driven recommendations to prepare for their next career move. 1Mentor provides students with real-time insights on the skills they need and connect them with skill-based courses to meet their career objectives.We equip key decision-makers with quality tools to understand industry’s rapidly-changing needs and prepare students for the future of work.Contact us and start preparing your learners for tomorrow’s work.

# **1Mentor Inc**  [1 Mentor](https://images-4-chatbot.s3.amazonaws.com/1M.jpg)

1Mentor's technology uses **AI** to understand industry’s ever-changing demands and empower students to outpace future disruptions. We equip institutions with data-driven recommendations on skills, tools and knowledge required by industry to enhance programs and student career guidance. Also, **1Mentor equips key decision-makers**  with industry information to better prepare students.

# **Your Path**

**link:** Students are interested in tracking multiple occupations of interest and how their skill set compares with the requirements of these occupations.

**Feature:**  In the home page, this tile shows an overview of the student's skill match relative to their registered occupations of interest. The "view more" button takes the user to Occupations / My Objectives.

**Benefit:** Students can monitor their progress towards their career goals at a glance.

1Mentor's technology uses **AI** to understand industry’s ever-changing demands and empower students to outpace future disruptions. We equip institutions with data-driven recommendations on skills, tools and knowledge required by industry to enhance programs and student career guidance. alt.markdown:
# **1Mentor Inc.**

1Mentor's technology uses **AI** to understand industry’s ever-changing demands and empower students to outpace future disruptions. We equip institutions with data-driven recommendations on skills, tools and knowledge required by industry to enhance programs and student career guidance. Also, **1Mentor** equips key decision-makers  with industry information to better prepare students. **1Mentor** empowers students with information helping them take an active role in pursuing their career path. 

For further information you can check the 1Mentor's [website](https://www.1mentor.io)
